name: Find 7 differences FREE
description:
The goal is spot 7 differences between two near-identical images. Enjoy up to 20 different levels with beautiful pictures and 7 differences to spot in each of them. The game is suitable for all ages, all you need is to have a sharp eye and good concentration skills.

Low and medium difficult.

If you think you smartphone screen is too small try the game in your tablet.

Do you want 100 puzzles more ? Then play Find 7 Differences:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Vialgames.Find7Differences

https://www.amazon.com/Vialgames-Find-7-differences/dp/B086YXN3VY/

Also available for Windows 10 PC:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/find-7-differences/9pcwcdhv06h4?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

Is it so easy for you ? Then play Find 10 Differences HARD edition:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Vialgames.Find10DifferencesHARD

https://www.amazon.com/Vialgames-Find-10-differences-HARD/dp/B086X2LP8P/

Also available for Windows 10 PC:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/find-10-differences-hard/9npnx9z4dp64?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
